docs.snippet: Moore-McCormack Lines, Inc., operator of cargo and passenger liners to Scandinavia and South America, announced yesterday that a lease had been taken on Pier 32, North River, a modern new terminal owned by New York City and said to be one of the best...
docs.lead_paragraph: Moore-McCormack Lines, Inc., operator of cargo and passenger liners to Scandinavia and South America, announced yesterday that a lease had been taken on Pier 32, North River, a modern new terminal owned by New York City and said to be one of the best in the country.

headline.main: MOORE-M'CORMACK TAKES BIG CITY PIER; Terminal, Not Yet Finished, Is Considered One of the Finest in the Country INTENDED FOR GERMANS American Lessee to Keep the Facilities It Now Has in Brooklyn and Jersey City

docs.snippet: MONTEVIDEO, Uruguay, Dec. 26--Sufficient official data has been compiled regarding the naval combat off Punta del Este, Uruguay, Dec. 13 to enable Argentine naval tacticians to construct a complete picture of the battle between the German pocket...
docs.lead_paragraph: MONTEVIDEO, Uruguay, Dec. 26--Sufficient official data has been compiled regarding the naval combat off Punta del Este, Uruguay, Dec. 13 to enable Argentine naval tacticians to construct a complete picture of the battle between the German pocket battleship Admiral Graf Spee and three British light cruisers, the Exeter, Ajax and Achilles.
docs.abstract: battle reconstructed from official data; map

headline.main: Exeter Fought Spee Till Dusk, New Reports on Battle Reveal; German Raider Believed to Have Had Orders to Avoid Clash So Far From Home--Three British Cruisers Forced the Combat

byline.original: By JOHN W. WHITE Wireless to THE NEW YORK TIMES

headline.main: Finnish Consul Going Home to Fight Soviet

docs.snippet: Encouraged by the scarcity of first-class heavyweight material and fired with the ambition that overtakes most fighters, Valentin Campolo arrived here yesterday after an eighteen-day voyage from the Argentine prepared to launch a campaign for a crack...
docs.lead_paragraph: Encouraged by the scarcity of first-class heavyweight material and fired with the ambition that overtakes most fighters, Valentin Campolo arrived here yesterday after an eighteen-day voyage from the Argentine prepared to launch a campaign for a crack at the heavyweight title held by Joe Louis.

headline.main: ARGENTINE BOXER SEEKS NOVA BOUT; BOXER ON ARRIVAL

CONCERT TONIGHT TO HELP FINLAND; Procope, Country's Envoy to U.S., Will Be Chief Guest at Carnegie Hall LOTTA SVAARD TO BENEFIT Women's Organization Takes Name From National Heroine --Patrons Are Announced Hjalmar J. Procope, Finnish Minister to the United States, will be guest of honor, and Finnish Consul General T.O. Vahervuori also will represent his country at the gala concert to be given in Carnegie Hall tonight for the benefit of the Lotta Svaard, Finnish women's organization. Origin of the Lotta Svaard Patrons and Patronesses

headline.main: FREE PORT JAMMED BY WAR SUPPLIES; Trade Zone Operators Ask Right to Use 2 More Piers as 50,000 Tons Wait BOOKED 6 MONTHS AHEAD Planes, Trench Diggers, Trucks Foodstuffs and Fibers Fill Five Docks

docs.snippet: BUENOS AIRES, Argentina, Dec. 27 (AP)--The Argentine Government announced tonight rejection of a German protest against internment of the crew of the scuttled Nazi pocket battleship Admiral Graf Spee.
docs.lead_paragraph: BUENOS AIRES, Argentina, Dec. 27 (AP)--The Argentine Government announced tonight rejection of a German protest against internment of the crew of the scuttled Nazi pocket battleship Admiral Graf Spee.
docs.abstract: Argentina rejects German protest; to separate crew from officers

headline.main: ARGENTINES REJECT NAZI PLEA ON SPEE; Demand That Crew of Warship Be Classed as 'Distressed Seamen' Is Denied REICH SHIPS HELD IN PORT Vessels Said to Await Result of Safety Zone Note Before Trying to Run Blockade

docs.snippet: Fred Apostoli, California boxer who has forsaken the middleweight for the light-heavyweight ranks, is an improved ringman if this exhibitions in training are any criterion.
docs.lead_paragraph: Fred Apostoli, California boxer who has forsaken the middleweight for the light-heavyweight ranks, is an improved ringman if this exhibitions in training are any criterion.
